pages.text: There are three known Magical Waxes that can be used when making candles. To make all three of these waxes, you will need an $(d)Empty Iron Press$(). The recipe can be found under the Basic Wax entry.

pages.title: Cursed Wax
pages.text: The first of these magical waxes is the $(d)Cursed Wax$(). This can be crafted by combining the above ingredients into an Iron Press.

pages.title: Purged Wax
pages.text: Next we have the $(d)Purged Wax$(). This can be crafted by combining the above ingredients into an Iron Press.

pages.title: Blessed Wax
pages.text: Finally, we have the $(d)Blessed Wax$(). This can be crafted by combining the above ingredients into an Iron Press.

pages.title: Crafting Magical Chunks
pages.text: Each one of these Filled Presses can be used in a crafting grid to yield the matching Magical Wax type.
